Text: View Live Webcast of CSFBs Annual Tech ConferenceDear CSFBdirect Investor We are pleased to invite you to a live Webcast of Credit Suisse First Bostons Fourth Annual Technology Conference November This years conference includes four days of presentations featuring over speakers discussing the current shortterm and longterm status of their companies Keynote speakers from among the most influential names in the technology industry may include Michael Dell CEO of Dell Computer Corporation Jeff Bezos Founder CEO of Amazoncom Inc Larry Carter CFO of Cisco Systems Inc Robert Pittman CoCOO AOL Time Warner Inc Andy Bryant EVP Chief Financial Enterprise Services Officer Intel Corporation To access the Webcast login to your CSFBdirect account then select Live Fourth Annual CSFB Technology Conference Webcast from the New at CSFBdirect section of the Home page An archived version of the conference will be available within two weeks of the event We hope you find this Webcast useful and informative On a periodic basis CSFBdirect will send you updates new product information and upcoming promotional opportunities to help you make the most of your relationship with us If you do not wish to receive these marketing communications you can update your marketing preferences by logging into your account visiting the Account Settings section of our web site at wwwCSFBdirectcom or by calling us at Please note that even if you choose not to receive marketing communications from us you will continue to receive information specifically related to your CSFBdirect account Please allow up to business days to process your request CSFBdirect Inc CSFBdirect a Credit Suisse First Boston Company All rights reserved Member NASD SIPC CSFBdirect is a trademark of Credit Suisse Group

Hewitt Financial Services via CSFBdirectDear Hewitt Financial Services via CSFBdirect Client On November CSFBdirects parent company Credit Suisse First Boston CSFB and Bank of Montreal TSE NYSE BMO announced their agreement for the Bank of Montreal parent company of Harris Bank to acquire CSFBdirect Bank of Montreal one of the largest banks in North America is a highly diversified financial services institution The bank operates more than lines of business within the Bank of Montreal Group of Companies including Chicago based Harris Bank a major US midwest financial services provider and Harris InvestorLine the Banks direct investing affiliate in the US Harris InvestorLine has a year history of servicing direct investing clients and retail branch locations across the country Hewitt Financial Services remains committed to providing you with the highest quality service and support If any changes to the Hewitt Financial Services program arise as a result of this transaction we will communicate those to you promptly As ever if you have any questions concerning your Hewitt Financial Services account you may call an Investor Services Representative at or send an email to Thank you for your continued business Sincerely Blake Darcy CEO CSFBdirect Inc Member NASD SIPC Stacy Schaus Principal Hewitt Financial Services LLC Member NASD SIPC
